abstract: Maiduguri Journal; Fati Abubakar travels streets of her hometown of Maiduguri, Nigeria, taking pictures of people going about their everyday lives in order to post them on Instagram; city is birthplace of Boko Haram, and almost every one of Abubakar's subjects has been affected by militant group in some way, but her goal is to transmit to world a sense that life in Maiduguri retains hope and happiness and is not completely governed by death and despair.

headline.print_headline: Capturing Images of Hope in Boko Haram’s Birthplace
headline.main: From Boko Haram’s Birthplace, Instagram Posts Beyond ‘Death and Despair’

snippet: A woman in violence-plagued Maiduguri, Nigeria, has developed a following by capturing residents’ positive stories on Instagram — though they can be hard to come by.
lead_paragraph: A woman in violence-plagued Maiduguri, Nigeria, has developed a following by capturing residents’ positive stories on Instagram — though they can be hard to come by.
